One of Gabrielle Giffords ' close friends, New York Senator Kirsten Gillibrand , was in the room when Gabrielle Giffords opened her eyes in response to her husband's voice. All of a sudden she started to struggle to open her eyes. And so Mark saw that and said--` open your eyes, Gabrielle Giffords , open your eyes,' recalled Kirsten Gillibrand .`` She kept struggling and struggling and Mark kept encouraging her. And with in a moment she literally opened her eyes. The doctor was unbelievably excited because this was such great progress.''
